sentences.en: An improvised platform was set up in the square.
sentences.cn: 在集市场上搭起了一座临时讲台.

sentences.en: Christine regarded the improvised bank draft doubtfully.
sentences.cn: 克丽丝汀怀疑地看着这张随随便便写的银行支票.

sentences.en: He improvised a bookcase out of crates.
sentences.cn: 他用板条箱临时做成书架.

sentences.en: He improvised a poem at the evening party.
sentences.cn: 他在晚会上现编了一首诗.

sentences.en: He improvised a song about the football team's victory.
sentences.cn: 他即席创作了一首足球队胜利之歌.

sentences.en: Improvised stalls offer the hundred delicious specialities of Morroccan cuisine.
sentences.cn: 临时搭建的食品摊为上百名食客提供着摩洛哥的美食佳肴.

sentences.en: Mike improvised a new verse for the school song atthe football game.
sentences.cn: 迈克在足球赛中临时为校歌作新词.

sentences.en: New forces had to be brought through Hungary from the north. All had to be improvised.
sentences.cn: 必须从北方假道匈牙利调派新的部队. 一切都需要临时筹措.

sentences.en: On her right hand she had what looked like an improvised glove.
sentences.cn: 她右手戴着一只看来象是临时凑合着用的手套.

sentences.en: The pianist improvised an accompaniment to the song.
sentences.cn: 那位钢琴家为那首歌即席伴奏.

sentences.en: The vet had improvised a harness.
sentences.cn: 兽医临时凑成了一副马具。

sentences.en: They just basked in his reflected glory and improvised somewhat.
sentences.cn: 他们只是满足于他留下的光荣和某些临时拼凑出来的东西.

sentences.en: Uncle Richard intoned a chapter from the Bible and improvised a prayer.
sentences.cn: 理查德叔叔吟诵了《圣经》中的一章，又即兴作了一段祈祷文。

sentences.en: We shook down a straw mattress as an improvised bed.
sentences.cn: 我们在地上摊开一条草垫作为临时床铺.

sentences.en: Writing - rooms , smoking - rooms , dining - rooms , all the customary facilities, were improvised and primitive.
sentences.cn: 办公室 、 吸烟室 、 饭厅 以及 所用常用的设备都是因陋就简.

words.tran_cn: 有启发的；有教育意义的
即兴创作；即兴表演；临时凑合
即兴创作；即兴表演；临时做；临时提供

trans.tran_cn: 临时拼凑，即兴演奏（improvise 的过去式及过去分词）
